text: Princess Odette Maniema Krempin (October 30, 1973) is an Congolese entrepreneur. She was a former honorary consul of the Democratic Republic of the Congo in Frankfurt am Main. She was a member of the Kuba Kingdom. She was born in Maniema, Zaire. Krempin disappeared in 2014 while being sought for questioning by Belgian police in the Duferco corruption scandal. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:African businesspeople Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo people Category:African philanthropists
title: Odette Krempin
